title: Citigroup Confronts Vaccine Holdouts in No Jab, No Job Mandate
itunes:title: Citigroup Confronts Vaccine Holdouts in No Jab, No Job Mandate
description:
Becky Frankiewicz, President at ManpowerGroup, shares her thoughts on the December jobs report and provides data on employment trends. Bloomberg News Finance Reporter Jenny Surane discusses Citigroup imposing a strict Covid-19 vaccine mandate for employees. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber has an overview of the new issue of Businessweek Magazine. Haseeb Qureshi, Managing Director at Dragonfly Capital, talks about VC trends in cryptocurrencies. And we Drive to the Close with Cliff Corso, President and CIO at Advisor Asset Management.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
